name: Unfairy Tales: A Decision Making Story
name_original: Unfairy Tales: A Decision Making Story
description:
- MANAGE YOUR KINGDOM
In this game, you are the manager of the biggest Kingdom in the Fantasy World!
All the fairy tales need you!

- HIRE HEROES
Hire Dragons, Wizards, Lumberjacks, etc to work as heroes for your Kingdom.
Stay tuned to achieve the best heroes with the cheapest salaries!

- HELP THE FAIRY TALES
Tales as Red Hood, Snow White, Three Little Pigs, etc need your help!
Send your heroes to the most amazing quests!

- FUN STORIES
The bad wolf got sick? The pigs will go on vacation?
Experience the stories that books don't tell you!

- GET RICH!
Wisely choose your heroes and the missions that you will face, your decisions wil change the fate of the Kingdom!
Richer, more powerful!
